amendment.description: To increase the budget allocation for programs to combat the global HIV/AIDS epidemic and to reduce the deficit.

vote.text: Amendment SA 281 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 47 - 51. Record Vote Number: 104.

action.text: Amendment SA 281 proposed by Senator Kerry. (consideration: CR S4408-4409) To increase the budget allocation for programs to combat the global HIV/AIDS epidemic and to reduce the deficit.
